resources.string: You do not have permission for this action!
It has not been viewed by anyone yet!
The efficiency coefficient of the document:
Click to select a new theme
t\* Swipe from left to right to go to the login window
t\* Swipe from right to left to get to the registration page
* The documents for which statistics should be collected have not been found! Perhaps you just don\'t have any added documents or there are no statistics on these documents
The user\'s documents were not found, add the documents using the appropriate button
There is no analytical data on the document, as users have not yet interacted with it in any way
Enter the text to filter the chat list
Before plotting, you need to request analytics in the settings located at the top of the page
There is no analytics on the specialties of the selected class of specialties, since users have not yet interacted with specialties of this type in any way!
There is no analytics on the skills of the selected skill class, since users have not yet interacted with this type of skills in any way!
\t\t* Enter the data and click on the Save to save the entered data.
Select the start date for collecting statistical data
Select the month of the start of statistical data collection
Select the year of the start of statistical data collection
Select the end date for collecting statistical data
Select the end of the start of statistical data collection
Select the end of the start of statistical data collection
The photo download has started, you can find the uploaded photo in the gallery
The download of the PDF file has started, to open the downloaded file, you need to go to the phone downloads
* There are no elements that you can add to the document, you can create the necessary elements right on the document creation page

no_items_in_adapter_arch">You do not have any archives to which you could add a document, to fix this, go to your personal account and select the \'ARCHIVE\' drop-down list, then add a new archive by clicking on the appropriate button
No documents have been added to this archive yet, in order to add documents, go to the main page of the application using the navigation bar and add the documents presented there to the archive
No user\'s specialties were found, add specialties using the button, but which is shown by the arrow
Select the way to display the list of documents
Select users with a certain status
Enter the parameters to get a filtered list of users
Enter the parameters to get a filtered list of documents
Select the user\'s status and click the \'save\' button that appears if you want to change his status
Select a certain number of users
Select a certain number of documents?
Enter the number of users to display
Select the type of data for which the user will be selected
It is necessary to enter the number of selected items other than zero
Select users with certain personal data?
No user experience entries found in the app, use the add button to add a new entry

Adding information about the user\'s experience in the application

Select the status of the operation being performed
It is necessary to add data on the user\'s email and phone before sending data to the server!
To update the data, the fields of the user\'s first and last name should not be blank!
The entered mail is already in use, all entered data except for it has been updated

It is necessary to specify the minimum or maximum salary!
